Key Match Events: The game’s turning point came in the 65th minute when DR Congo’s Yoane Wissa scored from the penalty spot to give his team a 2-1 lead.
Arthur Masuaku scored in the 82nd minute to secure a 3-1 victory for DR Congo.
Chancel Mbemba equalized for DR Congo in the 27th minute after Guinea's Mohamed Bayo scored a penalty in the 21st minute.
Miscellaneous Highlights: DR Congo sealed its ticket to the Africa Cup of Nations (AFCON) semi-finals with a 3-1 victory against Guinea.
The match began as a closely contested battle but saw DR Congo pull away with late goals.
DR Congo is set to face host Ivory Coast or Mali in the semifinals on Wednesday next week.
